full_title: PROMOTION by ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign (Ft. Future)
title: PROMOTION

description.plain: Rumored to be on the VULTURES 2 collab album. It was first previewed in a restaurant in Miami on December 10, 2023. A CD-quality snippet of an older version of the song surfaced on January 4, 2023. The song was played in full on March 9, 2024 at a private listening party for friends and family in Los Angeles. It was then performed in a public setting on March 10th in Phoenix, Arizona.

embed_content: Read “PROMOTION” by ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign on Genius
